branchCategory.name: Mechanical & Hand Operated Valves
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC mechanical valves have been designed to meet general industry standards and are capable of long, trouble-free life under stringent operating conditions. The simple construction, utilizing corrosion &nbsp;resistant aluminum die cast bodies with optional heavy duty actuators and Buna N seal design, ensure positive operation and media control.</p>

branchItem.name: VM
branchItem.description: The new VM100/200 series is now more lightweight and compact than the conventional model. The series has a variety of actuator types to choose from.  Also, with piping options of side ported and bottom ported, it is now possible to choose the mounting method with the side ported.

branchItem.name: VZM
VFM
VR
VHK
VH
VHS - New
branchItem.description: The VHS series provides a convenient means of isolating supplied pressure in a pneumatic system and exhausting downstream pressure for maintenance purposes.  The units can be locked in the exhaust position and can be an integral part of an energy isolation system.  Air flow direction is easily identified by handle orientation and labelling.  They can be used alone or can be conveniently connected to an FRL assembly using modular spacers.

branchItem.name: VHS - Legacy
